secret_rule: Only items that are used in a typical birthday party can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "balloons" and "cake".
I would like to ask if "streamers" can be brought to the game.
Player: Can I bring "confetti" to the game?
Player: Can I bring "presents" to the game?
Player: Can I bring "candles" to the game?

The rule seems to be that you can bring items typically associated with a party or a celebration. Items like "balloons," "cake," "streamers," "confetti," "presents," and "candles" all fit this theme. My guess is that the rule is you can bring items related to parties or celebrations.
